caption.p: Observed (mean ± SE) and model predictions (line plot with 95% confidence intervals) for the advancement of nest initiation dates in response to earlier snowmelt for all shorebird species nesting near Utqiaġvik (formerly Barrow), Alaska, 2003–2016. Julian date 145 = 25 May (24 May in leap years). Parameter estimates (± SE) and p‐values for the effect of 20% snow cover, along with sample sizes are presented at the top of each panel for each species
